div.div:
✓ Single deployable unit
✓ Shared memory space
✓ Single database
✓ All code in one codebase
✓ Direct function calls
✓ Simple deployment
✓ Easy debugging
✗ Hard to scale individually
✗ Technology lock-in
✗ Long build times

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 477px; margin-left: 613px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Small to medium apps
• Startups / MVPs
• Small teams (2-5 devs)
• Simple domains
• Rapid prototyping
• Limited budget

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
